name: Accurate Shot
description: You are an exceptional shot and know where to shoot an enemy in order to inflict maximum damage. You deal +1 damage per level of  Accurate Shot with all ranged weapons.

name: Acute Sense
description: One of your primary five senses is highly developed. You may make Perception check to detect normally imperceptible details with the related senses.

name: Aethyric Attunement
description: Your experience, talent or training lets you more safely manipulate the Winds of Magic. You do not suffer a Miscast if you roll a double on a successful Channel Test.

name: Alley Cat
description: You are at home in shadowy backstreets and urban environments. When using Stealth (Urban), you may reverse the dice of any failed Test if this will score a Success.

name: Ambidextrous
description: You can use your off-hand far better than most folk. You only suffer -10 penalty to test relying solely on your second hard. If you take this talent with, you suffer no penalty.

name: Animal Affinity
description: Wild animals feel comfortable in your presence. All creatures with Bestial Trait, not trained to be belligerent with calm in your presence, unless there is an external factor.

name: Arcane Magic
description: You either study one of the 8 Arcane Lores of Magic or practice a lesser known Lore, such as Hedgecraft or Necromancy. You may memorise spells from your lore with an associated XP cost.

name: Argumentative
description: You are used to arguing your points and winning debates. On a successful Charm Test to debate an opponent you may use either the tens or units die to determine SL.

name: Artistic
description: You have a natural talent for art. Add Art (Any) to any career you enter. If already a career skill, advanced cost 5XP less.

name: Attractive
description: Whether it's your piercing eyes, or your strong frame, you know how to make the best use of what the gods gave you. On a successful Charm Test on those attracted to you, you may use either the tens or units die to determine SL.

name: Battle Rage
description: You are better able to control your Frenzy in combat, channelling your rage more effectively. You can end your Frenzy with a successful Cool Test at the end of the round.

name: Beat Blade
description: You are trained to make sharp controlled blows to your opponent's weapon, creating an opening for an attack. As an action you may Beat Blade, make an unopposed Melee Test; on success reduce opposing Advantage pool by 1, and further -1 if you score 6 SL.

name: Beneath Notice
description: The high and mighty pay no attention to your presence, knowing you are well beneath their notice. Higher Status Tier will normally ignore you. No advantage gain for higher status tier striking or wounding you in combat.

name: Berserk Charge
description: You hurl yourself at your enemies with reckless abandon, using the force of your charge to your advantage. When charging +1 Damage per level of Talent to all melee attack when charging.

name: Blather
description: Blathering involves talking rapidly and incessantly about inconsequential. You use Charm skill to blather, opposed Charm/Intelligence Text. Success gives opponents Stunned Condition for each level in blather.

name: Bless
description: You are watched over by one of the Gods and can empower simple prayers. You may use the Blessings of your deity.

name: Bookish
description: You are as at home in a library as a seaman at sea or a farmer a-farming. When using Research, you may reverse the dice of any failed Test if this will score a success.

name: Break and Enter
description: You are an expert at quickly breaking down doors and forcing entry. You may add +1 Damage for each level of this Talent against inanimate objects such as windows, chests, doors etc

name: Briber
description: You are an exceedingly skilled briber, knowing exactly how much to offer and when. Gm should reduce base cost of any required bribe by 10% per level of Talents, to  min of 10%.

name: Cardsharp
description: You are used to playing, and winning, at cards, although your methods may involve a little cheating. On a successful Gamble or Sleight of Hand check you may use either the tens or units die to determine SL.

name: Careful Strike
description: You are skilled at hitting your enemy exactly where you want to, either at range or in melee. You may modify hit location result by +/- 10 for each level of talent.

name: Carouser
description: You are a seasoned drinker and know how to party hard. You may reverse the dice of any failed Consume Alcohol Test if this will score a Success.

name: Cat-tongued
description: When using Charm to Lie, listeners do not oppose your Charm with their Intuition to detect if there is something fishy with what you say.

name: Catfall
description: You are nimble and balanced like a cat. When you fall make Athletics Test, on success, reduce distance fallen by 1 yard; +1 extra yard per SL scored for purpose of of calculating damage

name: Chaos Magic
max: Number of Spells available in chosen Chaos Magic Lore
description: By accident or design you have lost a portion of your soul to one of the Dark Gods, and can now practice the foul magics of Chaos. You immediately gain access to a single spell from your chosen lore, and gain a Corruption Point

name: Combat Aware
description: You are used to scanning the battlefield to make snap decisions informed by the shifting tides of war. You may make Challenging (+0) Perception Text to ignore Surprise.

name: Combat Master
description: Your accumulated years of combat experience allow you to keep lesser fighters at bay. For each level of Talent you count as one more person for purposes of determining if out-numbered.

name: Combat Reflexes
description: You react like a flash of lightning in combat situations. Add 10 to your Initiative for each level in this Talent when determining Combat Initiative.

name: Commanding Presence
description: Your presence fills others with hushed awe and admiration. Lower Status may not resist your Leadership Tests with their Willpower.

name: Concoct
description: You are skilled at making potions, philtres, and draughts on the go. You may take one free Crafting Endeavour to use Lore (Apothecary) without a workshop.

name: Contortionist
description: You can bend and manipulate your body in a myriad of seemingly unnatural ways. This allows you to squeeze through unlikely gaps.

name: Coolheaded
description: You gain a permanent +5 bonus to your starting Willpower Characteristic.

name: Crack the Whip
description: You know how to get the most out of your animals when speed is essential. When an animal you control is Fleeing or Running, it gains +1 Movement if you are using a whip.

name: Craftsman
description: You have true creative talent in a specific trade or craft. Add associated Trade Skill to Any Career you enter. If already a career skill, advanced cost 5XP less.

name: Criminal
description: You are an active criminal making money from illegal sources, and you're not always quiet about it.

name: Deadeye Shot
description: You always hit an opponent right between the eyes… or wherever else you intended to hit. Instead of reversing dice to determine Hit Location, you may pick one when you hit with ranged weapon.

name: Dealmaker
description: You are a skilled businessman who knows how to close a deal.When using Haggle Skill, reduce or increase price of products by extra 10%.

name: Detect Artefact
description: You are able to sense when magic lies within an artefact. You may make an Intuition Test, if successful you sense if item is magical with each SL revealing a detail.

name: Diceman
description: You are a dicing master, and all claims you cheat are clearly wrong. When you successfully use Gambling or Slieght of Hand when playing dice, you may use either tens or units to determine SL.

name: Dirty Fighting
description: You have been taught all the dirty tricks of unarmed combat. You may cause +1 Damage for each level of Talent, with successful Melee (Brawling) hit.

name: Disarm
description: You are able to disarm an opponent with a careful flick of the wrist or a well-aimed blow to the hand. As an action make opposed Melee/Melee test if you win your opponent loses hold of weapon.

name: Disciple of Change
description: When you gain a mutation, roll twice and choose one of the two results.

name: Distract
description: You are trained in simple movements to distract your opponent. You may use your Move to perform a Distraction, make opposed Athletics/Cool Test. If you win opponent can generate no advantage for their Pool until end of next round.

name: Doomed
description: At the age of 10, a Priest of [[The Cult of Morr|Morr]] called a Doomsayer took you aside to foretell your death in an incense-laden, coming-of-age ritual called the Dooming.

name: Double Life
description: So adept are you at maintaining your Secret Identity, that you are able to live two completely separate lives.

name: Drilled
description: You have been trained to fight shoulder-to-shoulder with other soldiers. You count as two combatants when determining loosing advantage.

name: Dual Wielder
description: When armed with two weapons, you may attack with both for your Action. If you hit with first attack, keep dice and determine if it hit with second hand (-20 penalty). 2nd attack opposed with new roll.

name: Embezzle
description: You are skilled at skimming money from your employers without being detected. When Earning, you may attempt Opposed Intelligence Test with your employer. If you win you skim 2d10BP/1d10SS/1GC + 1 SL without being detected.

name: Enclosed Fighter
description: You have learned to make the most benefit out of fighting in enclosed spaces.You ignore penalties to melee caused by confined space, and can use dodge skill even if it would normally be disallowed.

name: Etiquette
description: You can blend in socially with the chosen group so long as you are dressed and acting appropriately.

name: Fast Hands
description: You can move your hands with surprising dexterity. Bystanders get no passive Perception Tests to spot  Sleight of Hand Skill, instead only get to oppose your Sleight of Hand if they actively suspect you. Melee (Brawling) to simply touch opponent gain bonus +10 x level of talent

name: Fast Shot
description: If you have a loaded ranged weapon, you can fire it outside the normal Initiative Order before any other combatant reacts in the following Round. Using Fast shout counts as using your Action and Move for the turn.

name: Fearless
description: You are either brave enough or crazy enough that fear of certain enemies has become a distant memory. With Average (+20%) Cool Test you may ignore intimate, Fear, Terror effect from specified enemy.

name: Feint
description: You have trained how to make false attacks in close combat to fool your opponent. You may make Feint action, opposed Melee (fencing)/Melee test. If you win, and attack same opponent, you may add SL of your feint to your attack roll.

name: Field Dressing
description: You are used to treating wounds quickly under pressure. If fail Heal Test when using bandages, you may reverse results if score will be success, if you do so you may not score more than +1 SL.

name: Fisherman
description: You are a very capable fisherman and know all the best ways to land fish. Automatically assumed to be able to fish to feed yourself and number of others equal to level in Fisherman. Requires 1 hour, with line and bate.

name: Flagellant
description: You have dedicated your pain to the service of your God. Each day you must spend 1/2 hour praying, and maintain wounds equal to level of talent. Until next sleep you have Frenzy Talent, and don't need to test to enter it.

name: Flee!
description: When your life is on the line you are capable of impressive bursts of speed. Your Movement Attribute counts as 1 higher when Fleeing.

name: Fleet Footed
description: You gain +1 to your Movement Attribute. This is a permanent increase to your Movement characteristic.

name: Frenzy
description: You can Frenzy as described in the Psychology rules. You can enter a state of Frenzy, gaining significant combat bonuses but losing some control over your actions.

name: Frightening
description: Anyone sane thinks twice before approaching you. If you wish, you have a Fear Rating of 1. Add +1 to this number per extra time you have this Talent.

name: Furious Assault
description: Your blows follow one another in quick succession, raining down on your opponents with the fury of Ulric. Once per round if you hit opponent in close combat you may spend Advantage or your Move to male extra attack.

name: Gregarious
description: You just like talking to other folk and it seems they like talking to you. You may reverse any failed Gossip Test if this allows the Test to succeed.

name: Gunner
description: You can reload blackpowder weapons with practiced ease. Add SL equal to your level in Gunner to any Extended Test to reload a Blackpowder weapon. Reloading a weapon also counts as the Assess action, you gain extra +1 Advantage making this Assess Action.

name: Hardy
description: You gain a permanent addition to your Wounds, equal to your Toughness Bonus. If your Toughness Bonus should increase, then the number of Wounds Hardy provides also increases.

name: Hatred
description: You are consumed with hatred for something in the Old World, as described in the Psychology rules.

name: Holy Hatred
description: Your prayers drip with the hatred you feel for your blasphemous enemies. You deal +1 Damage with Miracles for each level in this Talent.

name: Holy Visions
description: You clearly see the great works of the Gods all around you. You automatically know when you enter Holy Ground, and make take Intuition Test to receive visions regarding significant events .

name: Hunter's Eye
description: You are a skilled hunter and know all the best techniques to find game. You automatically able to hunt down enough game to feed self and number of other equal to the level of this talent, as long as you have time and correct equipment.

name: Impassioned Zeal
description: When you talk about your cause, case, or religion, your words fill with passion and fervent zeal. You may double Fellowship for purpose of deterring number people influenced by your Public Speaking.

name: Implacable
description: It takes a lot to finish you off. You can ignore the Wound loss from a Bleeding Condition. Each level in this Talent lets you ignore the Wound loss from an extra Bleeding Condition.

name: In-fighter
description: You are skilled at drawing in close to an opponent. You suffer no penalties for fighting against an opponent with a longer weapon than you. Further, if you use the optional rules for In-fighting you gain +10 bonus to hit opponent.

name: Inspiring
description: Your rousing words and pleas can turn the tide of a battle. You can influence people when using Leadership Skill when at war (see page 139).

name: Instinctive Diction
description: You instinctively understand the language of Magick, and are capable of articulating the most complex phrases rapidly without error. You do not suffer Miscast if you roll double on successful Language (Magic) Test.

name: Invoke
description: You are blessed by one of the Gods and can empower one of your Cult's Miracles. You again a miracle and may purchase another 2 for 100XP each. If you know 3, your next miracle costs 300XP.

name: Iron Jaw
description: You are made of sturdy stuff and can weather even the strongest blows. Whenever you gain stunned Condition, you make immediate Challenging (+0) Endurance test, to not take one level of stunned, with each SL removing extra cStunned Condition.

name: Iron Will
description: You have an indomitable will of iron, and will never willingly bow down before another. Use of Intimidation skills does not cause fear in you, and will not stop you speaking out against intimidating party.

name: Jump Up
description: You are hard to keep down. You may perform a Challenging (+0) Athletics Test to immediately regain your feet whenever you gain a Prone Condition. This Athletics Test is often modified by Strength whines below, for every +10 strength is over your Toughness, there is -10 penalty.

name: Kingpin
description: You have earned an air of respectability despite your nefarious ways. You may ignore the Status loss of the Criminal Talent.

name: Lightning Reflexes
description: You gain a permanent +5 bonus to your starting Agility Characteristic.

name: Linguistics
description: You have a natural affinity for languages. Given a month's exposure to any Language, you count the associated Language Skill as a Basic Skill with a successful Intelligence Test.

name: Lip Reading
description: You can tell what people are saying by simply watching their lips; you do not need to hear what they are saying. If you have unobscured view of face, you can make Perception Test to understand what they are saying.

name: Luck
description: They say when you were born, Ranald smiled. Your maximum Fortune Points now equal your current Fate points plus the number of times you've taken Luck.

name: Magic Resistance
description: You are resistant to magic. The SL of any spell affecting you is reduced by 2 per point you have in this Talent. The SL of a spell is only modified by the highest Magic Resistance Talent within area. You may never learn Arcane Magic, Bless, Invoke, Perry Magic or Witch! Talents.

name: Magical Sense
description: You are able to sense the Winds of Magic in others. You may attempt an Average (+20) Intuition Test whenever you encounter a spellcaster. If you pass, you sense the target is a witch, 6+ SL determine targets Channelling Specialisation.

name: Magnum Opus
description: You are an undisputed master in your field, able to create work of such incredible complexity others can but sit back and marvel at your genius.

name: Marksman
description: You gain a permanent +5 bonus to your starting Ballistic Skill. This does not count towards your Advances. This bonus applies to starting characteristics only and cannot be taken multiple times.

name: Master of Disguise
description: You are an expert at taking on the appearance and mannerisms of others. With nothing but posture changes, face twists and appropriate clothing you no long look like yourself without using a Disguise Kit.

name: Master Orator
description: You are skilled at firing up crowds. You gain a SL bonus equal to your levels of Master Orator to any Charm Test when Public Speaking before a crowd.

name: Master Tradesman
description: You are exceptionally skilled at your specified Trade skill. You reduce the required SL of any extended tests by the level of this Talent.

name: Menacing
description: You have an imposing presence. When using the Intimidate Skill, gain a SL bonus equal to your levels of Menacing.

name: Mimic
description: You have a good ear for accents and dialects, and can reproduce them accurately.You may replicate any accent you are exposed to for at least a day with an Initiative test. Once passed you may always mimic the accent.

name: Night Vision
description: You can see very well in natural darkness. Assuming you have at least a faint source of light (such as starlight, moonlight, or bioluminescence) you can see clearly for 20 yards per level of Night Vision.

name: Nimble Fingered
description: You gain a permanent +5 bonus to your starting Dexterity. This does not count towards your Advances. This bonus applies to starting characteristics only and cannot be taken multiple times.

name: Noble Blood
description: You are either born into the nobility, or otherwise elevated to it by in-game events. Assuming you are dressed appropriately you are always considered higher Status with others with the same status unless they have Noble Blood Talent.

name: Nose for Trouble
description: You are used to getting into, and preferably out of, trouble. You may make an Intuition Text to spot those seeking to cause trouble or harm.

name: Numismatics
description: You are well versed with the different coinage of the Old World, and are adept at determining their value. You can judge true value of a coin without requiring test. You can identify forged coins by a Simple Evaluation Test.

name: Old Salt
description: You are an experienced seaman, and are very used to sea life. You ignore all negative modifiers to tests at sea from poor weather, rolling ships etc. You count as two seamen toward minimum crew to pilot a sea going vessel.

name: Orientation
description: You have an instinctual feel for direction. You automatically know which direction is north with a glimpse at the stars, trees, or whatever other signs you are familiar with.

name: Panhandle
description: You are a skilled beggar, able to get even the most jaded individual to contribute to your cause. You can perform a Charm Test every half hour when Begging, not every hour.

name: Perfect Pitch
description: You have perfect pitch, able to replicate notes perfectly and identify them without even making a Test. Add Entertain (Sing) to any career you enter; if it's already in career, advances cost 5 less XP.

name: Petty Magic
description: You have the spark to cast magic within you and have mastered techniques to control it at a basic level. When you take this you permanently memorise number of Petter Magic Spells equal to your Willpower Bonus, you may learn extra spells at additional cost.

name: Pharmacist
description: You are highly skilled at pharmacy, better able than most to make pills, ointments, unguents, oils, creams, and more. You may reverse any failed Trade (Apothecary) test if this allows the test to succeed.

name: Pilot
description: You are skilled at leading vessels through dangerous waters. If you fail a Test to pass dangerous waters you may reverse result if it will score a success; however you may only have +1 SL.

name: Public Speaker
description: You are a skilled orator and know how to work large groups of people. You may influence greater number of people with your Charm skills when Public Speaking (page 142).

name: Pure Soul
description: Your soul is pure, quite resistant to the depredations of Chaos. You may gain extra Corruption points equal to your level of Pure Soul before having to Test to see if you become corrupt.

name: Rapid Reload
description: You can reload ranged weapons with practiced ease. You add SL equal to your level in Rapid Reload to any Test to reload a ranged weapon. Reloading a ranged weapon counts as Assess Action You gain extra +1 advantage when making this Assess test.

name: Reaction Strike
description: Your fast reactions have allowed you to fell many opponents before they have even swung their blades. When Charged, may make Challenging (+0) Initiative Test to immediately Free attack.

name: Read Write
description: You are one of the rare literate individuals in the Old World. You are assumed to be able to read and write (if appropriate) all of the Languages you can speak.

name: Relentless
description: When you have your mind set on a target, there is nothing anyone can do to stop you reaching them.  The Advantage cost of the Flee from Harm action is reduced by 1.

name: Resistance
description: Your strong constitution allows you to more readily survive a specific threat. You may automatically pass first test to resist specified threat. If SL is important, use your Toughness Bonus as SL for the Test.

name: Resolute
description: You launch into attacks with grim determination. Add your level of Resolute to your Strength Bonus when you Charge.

name: Reversal
description: You are used to desperate combats, able to turn even the direst circumstances to your Advantage. If you win Opposed Melee test, instead of gaining +1 advantage, you may take 1 advantage from opposing pool and add it to your own. If you do this you do not cause any Damage, even if it is your turn.

name: Riposte
description: Conforming to 'the best defence is offence', you respond to an incoming attack with a lightning-fast counterstrike of your own. If weapon has Fast quality, you may cause Damager when attacked. You can Riposte number of attacked per round equal to level of talent.

name: River Guide
description: You know all the tricks for navigating dangerous rivers. You don't Test for passing through dangerous stretches of water until difficulty for doing os is -10. If you have appropriate Lore (Local) skill you never Test for navigating dangerous water.

name: Robust
description: You are as tough as old boots and just soak up damage. You reduce all incoming damage by +1 for each level of the Talent.

name: Roughrider
description: You are at home in the saddle in even the most difficult of circumstances, and know how to get the best out of your mount during conflict. Assuming you have Ride skill, you direct mount to make Action, not just move, without Ride test.

name: Rover
description: You are at home roaming the wild places. When using Stealth in a rural environment, bystanders do not get passive Perception Tests to detect you; they can only spot you if they are specifically on look- out.

name: Savant
description: You are exceptionally learned, and have a significant degree of specialised knowledge in a single field of study. You know number of pieces of correct information equal to level of this talent without having to Test Lore Skill.

name: Savvy
description: You gain a permanent +5 bonus to your starting Intelligence Characteristic.

name: Scale Sheer Surface
description: You are an exceptional climber. You can attempt to climb even seemingly impossible surfaces such as sheer fortifications, ice shelves, plastered walls, and similar, and you ignore any penalties to Climb test derived from difficulty of surface climes.

name: Schemer
description: You are a master of politics and see conspiracy around every corner. Once per session you may ask GM one question regarding a political situation other than web of social connections. GM will make secret Intelligence Test and proceed you with observations.

name: Sea Legs
description: You are used to the rolling motion of the oceans, and are very unlikely to get sea sick, even in the worst storms. Under normal conditions at sea you never become sea sick. At other times, you may ignore penalties for test.

name: Seasoned Traveller
description: You are an inquisitive soul who has travelled far and wide, learning all manner of local information. Add Lore (Local) to any career you enter, if it's already in the career you may purchase the skill both times with different Speciality, for 5PX fewer per advance.

name: Second Sight
description: You can perceive the shifting Winds of Magic that course from the Chaos Gates at the poles of the world. You now have the Sight.

name: Secret Identity
description: You maintain a secret identity that allows you to appear richer, or perhaps poorer, than you actually are. (Page 144)

name: Shadow
description: You are skilled at following people without being spotted. You maybe use the Shadowing rules (page 130) without a combined test. You test against your perception or Stealth whichever is higher.

name: Sharp
description: You gain a permanent +5 bonus to your starting Initiative Characteristic.

name: Sharpshooter
description: You can make aimed shots of exceptional accuracy. You ignore any negative Difficulty modifiers to Ranged Tests due to the size of your target.

name: Shieldsman
description: You are skilled at using your shield to manoeuvre others in combat so you can take advantage of a desperate situation. When using a shield to defend, once per turn, you may spend 2 advantage to either cause Damage when attacked or push your opponents 2 yards directly back.

name: Sixth Sense
description: You get a strange feeling when you are threatened, and can react accordingly. Gm will warn you if you are walking into danger. You may ignore surprise if you pass an Intuition Test.

name: Slayer
description: When determining Damage use your opponent's Toughness Bonus as your Strength Bonus if it is higher. If opponent larger than you, and you score a critical, multiply all melee Damage by difference in size.

name: Small
description: You are much shorter than most folk in the Old World. The full rules for different Sizes are found in Chapter 12: Bestiary. This talent typically represents Halflings and other small-sized creatures.

name: Sniper
description: Distance is of no import to your shooting skills, and you are just as adept at picking off far away targets as those nearby. You suffer no penalties for shooting at Long range, and half penalties for Extreme range.

name: Speedreader
description: You read books at a voracious pace. You may reverse a failed Research Test if will grant success. If the speed at which you read is important in combat, a successful Language Test lets you read and fully comprehend number of pages per round equal to you SL + level of this Talent.

name: Sprinter
description: You are a swift runner. Your Movement Attribute counts as 1 higher when Running.

name: Step Aside
description: You are skilled at being where enemy weapons are not. If you use Dodge to defend again incoming attack and win, you may move 2 yards as you dive away. None of your opponents will gain a Free Attack.

name: Stone Soup
description: You are used to getting by with less, and know how to survive lean times. You can subsist on half amount of food, and only test for Starvation every 3 days, not 2.

name: Stout-hearted
description: No matter how bad things get, you always seem to come back for more. You may attempt a Cool Test to remove a Broken Condition at the end of each of your Turns as well as at the end of the Round.

name: Strider
description: You are experienced in traversing difficult ground. You ignore all movement penalties when crossing over or through a specified terrain.

name: Strike Mighty Blow
description: You know how to hit hard! You deal your level of Strike Mighty Blow in extra Damage with melee weapons.

name: Strike to Injure
description: You are an expert at striking your enemies most vulnerable areas. When rolling on a crucial Damage Table, make two rolls and choose which result you prefer.

name: Strike to Stun
description: You know where to hit an opponent to bring him down fast. You ignore penalty to strike Head hit location, when using melee weapon with Pummel Quality. You count all improvised weapons as having the Pummel Quality.

name: Strong Back
description: You have a strong back that is used to hard work. You may add your levels in Strong Back to your SL in any Opposed Strength Tests, and can carry additional Encumbrance points of trappings equal to your level of Strong Back

name: Strong Legs
description: You have strong legs able to carry you great distances when you jump. Add your Strong Legs level to your SL in any Athletics Tests involving Leaping.

name: Strong Swimmer
description: You are an especially strong swimmer and used to holding your breath for a long time underwater. nGain bonus equal to level in this talent to Toughness Bonus when holding breath.

name: Strong-minded
description: You are the epitome of determination and resolve. Add your level in Strong Minded to your maximum Resolve pool.

name: Sturdy
description: You have a brawny physique, or are very used to carrying things. Increase the number of Encumbrance Points you can carry by your Sturdy level x 2.

name: Suave
description: You gain a permanent +5 bonus to your starting Fellowship Characteristic.

name: Suffused with Magic
description: All spells cast within Willpower Bonus yards of you gain +1 SL to cast. This Bonus may only be claimed once per casting, no matter how many Characters with this Talent are in the vicinity.

name: Super Numerate
description: You have a gift for calculation and can work out the solution to most mathematical problems with ease. You may use a simple calculator to represent what your PC is capable of mentally computing.

name: Supportive
description: You know what to say and when to make the most impact upon your superiors. When you successfully use a Social Skill to influence those of a higher Status, you can choose to use the tens or units rolled as the SL.

name: Sure Shot
description: You know how to find the weak spots in a target's armour. When you hit a target with a Ranged weapon, you may ignore Armour Points equal to your Sure Shot level.

name: Surgery
description: You are a surgeon, able to open and close the flesh in order to heal others. You can treat a Critical Wound marked as needing surgery. (Page 146)

name: Tenacious
description: You never give up, no matter how impossible your travails appear. You can double length of time successful Endurance Tests allow you to endure hardship.

name: Tinker
description: You are somewhat of a Johann-of-all-trades, able to repair almost anything. You count all non-magical Trade Skills as Basic when repairing broken items.

name: Tower of Memories
description: A recollection technique first instigated by the Cult of Verena, reputedly from Elven practices taught by the Loremasters of Hoeth, Tower of Memories allows you to perfectly recall a sequence of facts.

name: Trapper
description: You are skilled at spotting and using traps. You may take a Perception Test to spot traps automatically without having to tell the GM of your intention; the GM may prefer to make some of these test on your behalf in private.

name: Trick Riding
description: You are capable of amazing feats of agility on horseback. You can use any of your Performer Skills and unmodified dodge skill when on horseback. When mounted you can make move at start of Round instead of on your turn.

name: Tunnel Rat
description: You are at home in tunnels, sewers, and other underground environments.When using steal in an underground environment, no passive Perception tests to detect you.

name: Tzeentch's Blessing
description: Tzeentch, the Chaos God of Magic, has gifted you with a worming parasite within your mind.

name: Unshakable
description: You are a jaded veteran who has survived more than one hail of shots from Blackpowder weapons. You need only take a Cool test to resist a Broken Condition if you are successfully wounded by a Blackpower weapon.

name: Very Resilient
description: You gain a permanent +5 bonus to your starting Toughness Characteristic.

name: Very Strong
description: You gain a permanent +5 bonus to your starting Strength Characteristic.

name: War Leader
description: Your stern gaze and inspiring words motivate your soldiers to fight on to the end. All subordinates able to see you may add your level in this talent to their SL in one Willpower test per round, this bonus does not stack.

name: War Wizard
description: You are trained to cast magic while in the thick of combat. Om your turn you may cast one Spell with a Casting Number of 5 or less for free without using your Action. However if you do this, you may not cast another spell this turn.

name: Warrior Born
description: You gain a permanent +5 bonus to your starting Weapon Skill Characteristic. This doesn't count as Advances. This bonus applies to starting characteristics only and cannot be taken multiple times.

name: Waterman
description: You are an experienced freshwater sailor and are well-versed with river vessels. You can ignore all negative to your Test when onboard a barged derived rom rolling waters etc. Further you count as two boatmen towards the minimum number of crew to pilot a river vessel.

name: Wealthy
description: You are fabulously wealthy, and are rarely ever short of coin. When Earning (including Income Endeavours) you secure +1 GC per time you have this Talent.

name: Well-prepared
description: You are used to anticipating the needs of others, and yourself. Number of times per session equal to the levels of this talent, you may pull the required trapping from your backpack provided it has Endurance , and could feasibly be bought recently. You must deduct cost for the item.

name: Witch!
description: You have learned magic through trial and error. Add Language (Magick) to any Career you enter; if it is already in your Career, you may purchase the Skill for 5 XP fewer per Advance.You may immediately spend 1 Resilience point to cast any spell as if it was one of your Arcane Lore spells, you may memorise that spell for 0 XP. You may do this number of times equal to your level in this talent.
